channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Catholic Chicagoans celebrate as native son Pope Leo XIV becomes first American pope
item.description: Catholic Chicagoans gathered in churches, cheered from classrooms and celebrated from their homes as the historic decision was announced that a native son, Cardinal Robert Prevost, had been elected pope.

item.title: Up to 1,000 transgender troops are being moved out of the military in new Pentagon order
Melania Trump hosts White House event to unveil Barbara Bush postage stamp
